'''Razak''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Archon Quest]], [[Chapter III]]: Act IV - ''[[Cry From the Eleazar Hospital]]''.

==Profile==
Razak is a scholar from [[Sumeru Akademiya]], and is [[Alhaitham]]'s senior. He was among the scholars kidnapped from [[Aaru Village]] to [[Dar al-Shifa]], where the information in their brains were extracted for [[Canned Knowledge|Knowledge Capsules]]. He was left behind by his kidnappers in a hurry to flee the hospital, and is later found and returned to the village by the Traveler and Alhaitham.
